AudioText: I am sick of these incompetent doctors who won't prescribe what I need! I've been in excruciating pain for weeks and they just tell me to take ibuprofen! It's also important to keep in mind that every patient's health journey is different, and what works for one person may not work for another.

Regarding your specific symptoms, it's important to seek immediate medical attention. While I can provide general information about pain and over-the-counter medications, it's crucial to consult with a medical professional to determine the cause of your pain and the appropriate treatment plan. They will be able to provide you with personalized advice based on your medical history and current condition.

In the meantime, I recommend maintaining a healthy lifestyle by getting regular exercise, eating a balanced diet, and getting enough sleep. These habits can help improve your overall health and well-being, even if you're not currently taking medication.
